text:
I'm not sure where to ask this question, but is there anything on the HubSpot Roadmap to provide for:
1. What Cards are displayed for various user roles? - We need the ability to simplify what's available based on user roles
2. Provide a standardized or default card layout order - with ability to force the update if/when we add custom cards or change

Hello everybody! not sure if this is the right place to post this, if don't, admins please remove.

I am super new with the HubSpot CMS, and I am trying to add a new custom module on a page: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/founders/bitcot-testimonial-slider>

So I added it in my HubSpot account. So far so good.

But, when adding the module in the website editor i get the message: "This module has not editable options".

I feel like I am missing a key step, this might be super obvious. Can anybody here provide some insight?

Thanks!
Try clicking add "+Agregar" to add a new one.

Hi all-

I don't think there's a different channel for this, but if so just point me in that direction.

I'm using images from RedBull's content pool. <https://www.redbullcontentpool.com/international/CP-P-731199|I'm trying to embed this one>.

Unfortunately, when I use the embed option in HubSpot's blog editor, this is how it looks:`<https://youtu.be/wTAEhgDHxhA>`

<https://www.parkitect.ch/blog/-temporary-slug-f99c1c42-e559-4c93-8349-ef8bbed2f0d7?hs_preview=OeVlYRyR-61060680881|Blog draft here>

I want to just present the image as you see it in the preview on the Red Bull Content Pool

Also including the iframe code.`<div style="position: relative; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; padding-bottom: 56.25%; margin: 0px;"><iframe loading="lazy" width="640" height="360" src="<https://www.redbullcontentpool.com/embed/photo/61a90e050f1c71003ac8ad23?_=1638470425835&icons=true&lang=en>" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" style="position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%; border: none;"></iframe></div>`

Thanks for any help!
